Cañon City.title: Cañon City
Cañon City.byline: Cañon City is a city in Colorado.

Cañón del Sumidero.title: Cañón del Sumidero
Cañón del Sumidero.byline: Cañón del Sumidero is in Chiapas, just east of Tuxtla Gutierrez.

Cañada de la Virgen.title: Cañada de la Virgen
Cañada de la Virgen.byline: Cañada de la Virgen is an archaeological site in the state of Guanajuato, Mexico, about 30 km from the colonial city of San Miguel de Allende.
